question: Which among the following fundamental rights is available to Indian Citizens but not to aliens?
explanation:
Following fundamental Rights available to only citizens and not foreigners:
  1. Prohibition of discrimination on grounds of religion, race, caste, sex or place of birth (Article 15)Equality of opportunity in matters of public employment (Article 16).
  2. Six basic freedoms subject to reasonable restrictions (Article 19).
  3. Protection of language, script and culture of minorities (Article 29).
  4. Right of minorities to establish and administer educational institutions (Article 30)
